extension.description:
matches and changes favourite stream titles to a more EPG friendly format.
••••• Stream Fixes Tab •••• Will change your favourite °INDIVIDUAL STREAMS° from addons and playlist loader to work automatically in epgs Ivue ect providing the addon can match up the titles in the database. ••••• Send Feed Back Tab•••If you have streams NOT linking into the guide then clicking this tab sends me a copy of the streams NOT linking in which i will then add into the title database (i aim to update the database every 24 hours)
